settings.title: Get on board
settings.text: Leading retailers, fitness studios, subscription boxes, offices and restaurants around the country are now offering hydrating wellness drops you can add to any drink.

that dissolve instantly and evenly in every drink and are flavorless in everything but water.

Buoy’s macro and micronutrients work at the cellular level for hydration and nutrition that run deep.
settings.title: Hydrating wellness drops are <u style="white-space: nowrap;">electrolytes +</u>
Only clean ingredients
settings.text: We got rid of the junk in traditional sports drinks and hydration products and sourced functional ingredients we’re proud of. 0 sugar, 0 calories, 0 artificial ingredients, 0 alternative sweeteners

settings.title: Sustainability focused
settings.text: Our Buoy bottles are made from 100% PCR (Post-Consumer Recycled) materials. Each bottle has 40 servings, cutting down on the amount of materials used per serving. Made in the USA.
settings.subtext: NO NEW PLASTICS | NO SINGLE SERVING PACKAGES

settings.title: Majority diverse founders
settings.text: Buoy is a minority led company with a focus on inclusive hiring practices, onboarding diverse board of advisors and giving back to communities that need clean, effective hydration the most.
settings.subtext: TRIPLE BOTTOM LINE: PEOPLE, PLANET & PROFIT

settings.title: We’re in it together
settings.text:
